title: aura.legal
author: aura.legal
content: Aura Legal - Licensed crypto exchanger in the European Union!We work with popular cryptocurrencies:Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, XRP, USDT.You can purchase USDT using Visa/MasterCard EUR and SEPA EUR.The AuraPay service is also available - paying bills in EURO using USDT.All exchanges are carried out on our website by filling out an application. Also, in the direction from Euro, KYC verification is required.Our contacts:Chat on the website: www.aura.legalMail: order@aura.legal

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: aura.legal on December 08, 2023, 09:26:44 AMWe work with popular cryptocurrencies:Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, XRP, USDT.I believe this is the first time I've seen an exchanger's reserves that "mostly consist of round numbers" only and that makes me skeptical!Would you mind signing a message from an address that has one-tenth of your Bitcoin reserve?

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: The company's address indicates that it is from Litva, which owns the dialing code +371, while the number +370 appears on the site, which is the dialing code for Lithuania. Do you have a different number from the place of registration or what? Can you add the registration number?There is no additional data on the Internet or user experiences, so it is difficult to trust you.
